article_title: Why has the UN secretary-general called this vote?
sentence: I  think  the  strategy  behind  the  secretary-general’s  decision  to  bring  a  vote  –  which  he  knew  would  probably  get  vetoed  –  was  to  hurry  up  the  inevitable  moment  when  the  Americans  will  say  to  Israel:  "Enough  is  enough,  you’ve  had  enough  time  and  killed  enough  people  and  it’s  time  for  a  ceasefire.  "
